nodes.text: Dreryn was a Arcona officer who, around 1 ABY was on Tansarii Point Station, a space station that orbited the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell. Dreryn primarily resided in the station's medical facility.

Dreryn's only appearance was in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, which was developed by Sony Online Entertainment. Dreryn, along with all of Tansarii Point Station, was added with the New Game Enhancements on November 15, 2005. Star Wars Galaxies shut down on December 15, 2011.
